translation.en: What went we out into this wilderness to find?
translation.fr: Pourquoi sommes-nous venusdans ces contrées sauvages ?

translation.en: Leaving our country, kindred,
translation.fr: Nous avons quitté notre pays, nos familles,

translation.en: our fathers' houses?
We travailed a vast ocean.
translation.fr: Nous avons bravé un vaste océan.

translation.en: For what?
-For what? -We must ask thee to be silent.
Was it not for the pure
translation.fr: N'était-ce pas afin de répandre,dans la pureté et dans la foi,

translation.en: and faithful dispensation of the Gospels
translation.fr: afin de répandre,dans la pureté et dans la foi, les Évangiles

translation.en: -and the Kingdom of God? -No more!
translation.fr: et le règne de Dieu ? Il suffit !

translation.en: We are your judges, and not you ours.
translation.fr: C'est nous qui vous jugeonset non l'inverse.

translation.en: I cannot be judged by false Christians,
translation.fr: De faux chrétiens ne me jugeront pas,

translation.en: for I have done nothing save preach Christ's true Gospel.
translation.fr: car je n'ai fait que prêcherla vérité des Évangiles.

translation.en: Must you continue to dishonor the laws of the Commonwealth
translation.fr: Persisterez-vous à déshonorerles lois de la colonie et de l'Église

translation.en: and the Church with your prideful conceit?
translation.fr: Persisterez-vous à déshonorerles lois de la colonie et de l'Église par votre orgueil ?

translation.en: If my conscience sees it fit.
translation.fr: Si ma conscience me le dicte.

translation.en: Then shall you be banished from this plantation's liberties.
translation.fr: Alors, vous serez bannide cette plantation.

translation.en: I would be glad on it.
Then take your leave, and trouble us no further.
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, prenez congé et ne nous dérangez pas davantage.

translation.en: How sadly hath the Lord testified against you.
translation.fr: Vous êtes une déceptionpour le Seigneur.

translation.en: Come.
I will confess Jehovah with all heart
translation.fr: Je louerai l'Éternel de tout mon cœur,

translation.en: In secret and assembly of the just
translation.fr: en secretet dans l'assemblée des Justes.

translation.en: Great are the works of our Lord Jehovah
translation.fr: Bénie soitla création de notre Seigneur,

translation.en: Sought out of all that In them do delight...
I here confess I have lived in sin.
translation.fr: J'ai de nombreux péchés à confesser.

translation.en: I have been idle of my work,
disobedient of my parents,
neglectful of my prayer.
I have, in secret, played upon thy Sabbath
translation.fr: En secret,j'ai joué le jour du Seigneur,

translation.en: and broken every one of thy commandments in thought,
translation.fr: j'ai enfreint tous les commandementsen pensée,

translation.en: followed the desires of mine own will and not the Holy Spirit.
translation.fr: je n'ai écouté que moi-même,au lieu du Saint-Esprit.

translation.en: I know I deserve all shame and misery in this life,
translation.fr: Je sais que je méritela honte et le malheur dans cette vie

translation.en: and everlasting hellfire.
translation.fr: et les flammes éternelles dans l'au-delà

translation.en: But I beg thee,
for the sake of thy Son, forgive me.
translation.fr: au nom de Ton fils, de me pardonner.

translation.en: Show me mercy.
Show me thy light.
Thomasin.
Where's Sam? Where is Sam?
Where is that little man?
There you are. There you are.
translation.fr: Tu es là ! Tu es là !

translation.en: Samuel!
Sleep.
All will be well.
Sleep.
...and send thy Holy Spirit into me,
translation.fr: Envoie Ton Esprit Saintdans mon cœur,

translation.en: which may show me that thou art my father
translation.fr: montre-moi que Tu es mon père,que je suis Ton enfant

translation.en: and I am thy child...
translation.fr: montre-moi que Tu es mon père,que je suis Ton enfant et que Tu m'aimesd'un amour immuable et éternel...

translation.en: God give you good morrow.
All are still a-bed.
Save Mother.
'Tis no ease to rise on a gray day.
translation.fr: Se lever est difficile, par temps gris,

translation.en: The Devil holds fast your eyelids.
translation.fr: le diable pèse sur les paupières.

translation.en: -I'll wake 'em. -No, let 'em be.
Thy mother's not slept a night since.
translation.fr: Ta mère n'a pas eu une nuit de sommeil,depuis.

translation.en: We can search no more, Caleb.
translation.fr: Nous ne pouvons plus le chercher.

translation.en: We cannot.
If not a wolf, then hunger'd have taken him yet.
translation.fr: Si ce n'était pas un loup,la faim l'aura emporté.

translation.en: Let's to the wood.
I've been a-laying traps for some while now,
even before this new misery.
Within the wood?
Will thou not help thy father?
You and Mother have always forbad us to set foot there.
translation.fr: Mère et vousnous avez interdit d'y aller.

translation.en: Caleb, our harvest cannot last the winter.
translation.fr: Notre récoltene suffira pas pour l'hiver.

translation.en: We must catch our food if we cannot grow it.
translation.fr: Nous devons chasser, si rien ne pousse.

translation.en: We will conquer this wilderness. It will not consume us.
translation.fr: Nous conquerrons cette contrée,elle ne nous consumera pas.

translation.en: Art thou then born a sinner?
Aye. I was conceived in sin, and born in iniquity.
translation.fr: Oui, j'ai été conçu dans le péché et je suis né dans l'iniquité.

translation.en: And what is thy birth sin?
translation.fr: Et quel est ton péché originel ?

translation.en: Adam's sin imputed to me, and a corrupt nature dwelling within me.
translation.fr: Le péché d'Adam m'incombe et ma nature profonde est corrompue.

translation.en: Well-remembered, Caleb. Very well.
translation.fr: Tu as bien appris, Caleb,c'est très bien.

translation.en: And canst thou tell me what thy corrupt nature is?
translation.fr: Peux-tu me direce qu'est cette nature corrompue ?

translation.en: My corrupt nature is empty of grace,
translation.fr: Ma nature corrompueest dénuée de grâce,

translation.en: bent unto sin, only unto sin, and that continually.
translation.fr: encline au péché et rien qu'au péché et ce, sans cesse.

translation.en: Soft now.
We must lay't again.
translation.fr: Il faut le remettre en place.

translation.en: Was Samuel born a sinner?
translation.fr: Est-ce que Samuel était un pécheur ?

translation.en: Aye.
How might then...
We pray he hath entered God's Kingdom.
translation.fr: Nous prionspour qu'il soit au royaume de Dieu.

translation.en: -What wickedness hath he done? -Place faith in God, Caleb.
translation.fr: - Quel mal avait-il fait ?- Aie foi en Dieu.

translation.en: -We'll speak no more on thy brother. -Why?
translation.fr: Nous ne parlerons plus de ton frère. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: He hath disappeared not one week past, yet you and Mother utter not his name.
translation.fr: Il a disparu il y a moins d'une semaine et vous ne dites plus son nom !

translation.en: He's gone, Caleb.
-Tell me. -Tell thee what?
-Is he in hell? -Caleb!
Mother will not stop her prayer...
And if I died? If I died this day?
-What is this? -I hold evil in me heart.
Me sins are not pardoned.
translation.fr: Mes péchés ne sont pas absous.

translation.en: Thou art youngly yet-- -And if God will not hear my prayers? -Caleb!
translation.fr: - Tu es jeune...- Et si Dieu ne m'entend pas ?

translation.en: Tell me!
Look, you,
I love thee marvelous well,
but 'tis God alone, not man, what knows who is a son of Abraham and who is not.
translation.fr: mais seul Dieu saitqui est un fils d'Abraham ou pas,

translation.en: Who is good and who is evil.
translation.fr: qui est bon et qui est mauvais.

translation.en: Fain would I tell thee Sam sleeps in Jesus,
translation.fr: J'aimerais pouvoir te direque Sam est au paradis,

translation.en: that thou wilt, that I will,
translation.fr: que tu iras et moi aussi,

translation.en: but I cannot tell thee that.
translation.fr: mais je ne peux te dire cela.

translation.en: None can.
Where are these from?
From Indian Thom and Old Slater, when last they passed through.
translation.fr: Thom l'Indien et le vieux Slater.

translation.en: What did you trade?
Thy mother's silver cup.
translation.fr: La coupe en argent de ta mère.

translation.en: Speak none of this to Mother. None.
translation.fr: Ne dis rien de tout cela à ta mère,rien.

translation.en: She is overwrought already.
I'll tell her of the cup when her grief has passed.
translation.fr: Je lui dirai pour sa coupequand son chagrin sera passé.

translation.en: Let's not speak on this again.
Fowler!
Fool of an animal.
Fowler, what is't?
Praise be to God. Make haste, Caleb.
Fie upon't!
Father, it died.
The other end.
Father.
Off, Fowler.
Black Phillip, Black Phillip A crown grows out his head
translation.fr: Philippe le Noira une couronne sur la tête

translation.en: Black Phillip, Black Phillip To nanny queen is wed
translation.fr: Philippe le Noirsa reine, c'est la biquette !

translation.en: Jump to the fence post...
translation.fr: Il saute la clôtureet court partout...

translation.en: Jonas, Mercy, come hither.
Black Phillip, king of all
translation.fr: Philippe le Noir règne sur tout !

translation.en: Black Phillip, Black Phillip King of sky and land
translation.fr: Philippe le Noir,roi du ciel et de la terre

translation.en: Black Phillip, Black Phillip King of sea and sand
translation.fr: Philippe le Noir,roi du sable et de la mer !

translation.en: We are ye servants We are ye men
translation.fr: Nous sommes vos serviteurs,nous sommes vos serfs

translation.en: Black Phillip eats the lions From the lions' den
translation.fr: Philippe le Noirmange des lions au dessert !

translation.en: Black Phillip, Black Phillip A crown grows out his head
translation.fr: Philippe le Noira une couronne sur la tête

translation.en: Black Phillip, Black Phillip To nanny queen is wed
translation.fr: Philippe le Noir,sa reine, c'est la biquette !

translation.en: Get back! You two, stop that!
Phillip! Back!
Back! Heavens bless us!
Caleb, ope' the gate!
I'll have thee quiet.
Whither were you and Caleb this morn?
How could you disappear?
And thee! I told thee to keep watch of Jonas and Mercy.
translation.fr: Et toi, tu devais surveillerJonas et Mercy.

translation.en: I was, and I bade them help me, and they paid me no mind.
translation.fr: Je les surveillaismais ils ne m'écoutent pas.

translation.en: -I was a-getting-- -What's the matter with thee, Thomasin? What's the matter with thee?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu as dans le crâne ?

translation.en: Take thy father's rags to the brook and wash 'em.
translation.fr: Va laver les vêtements de ton père.

translation.en: -They would pay me no mind-- -And brush out his woolens.
translation.fr: - Ils ne m'écoutent pas.- Et brosse ses lainages.

translation.en: Help him!
My lamb.
It gave me such a fright to find thee gone.
translation.fr: j'ai eu si peur,en voyant que tu étais parti.

translation.en: I'll not be left here alone. Dost hear?
translation.fr: On ne me laisse pas seule, compris ?

translation.en: The morning's work is well behindhand.
translation.fr: Nous avons pris du retardsur les corvées du matin.

translation.en: -Jonas! Leave thy sister be! -She likes it.
translation.fr: Jonas, laisse ta sœur ! Elle aime bien !

translation.en: William?
What, cannot a father spend Godly time with his son?
translation.fr: Un père ne peut-ilprofiter de son fils ?

translation.en: -Father said stop it. -Thomasin!
Stop it, each of you! Stop it.
-Thomasin, take the twins inside. -No!
Get inside. Get inside. Get inside.
As you like.
We went to find apples.
In the valley.
I had thought I seen an apple tree in the valley.
translation.fr: je croyais y avoir vu un pommier.

translation.en: Father brought the gun,
translation.fr: Père a pris le fusil, pour le loup...

translation.en: -for if we glanced that wolf-- -Why did you not tell me?
translation.fr: Père a pris le fusil, pour le loup... Pourquoi n'avoir rien dit ?

translation.en: Father wanted it a surprise to cheer you, and...
But there were none.
I thought I had seen them.
I like you not outside the farm. Even to the valley.
translation.fr: Ne quitte pas la ferme,même pour aller dans la vallée.

translation.en: Dost hear me?
Be a good lad and get some water for Mother.
translation.fr: Sois gentil,va chercher de l'eau pour ta mère.

translation.en: Stray not from the brook.
Why are you dallying?
What then?
What?
-Stop it. -I meant no harm in it.
What's the matter with thee?
Come hither.
What's the matter with thee?
I have seen no apple since we went from England.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas vu de pommesdepuis l'Angleterre.

translation.en: I would thou had found 'em.
translation.fr: J'aurais aimé que tu en trouves.

translation.en: I so wish for one.
Hear that?
Who's there?
I be the Witch of the Wood.
translation.fr: Je suis la sorcière de la forêt !

translation.en: Mercy, come out.
I be not Mercy, I be the Witch of the Wood.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas Mercy,mais la sorcière de la forêt.

translation.en: And I have come to steal ye!
Hear me stick a-flying through the trees...
translation.fr: Je vole sur mon balaià travers les branches.

translation.en: Why is't when thou dost a wrong,
I be a-washing Father's clothes like a slave, and thou art playing idle?
translation.fr: je dois laver les habits de pèreet toi, tu joues.

translation.en: -Because Mother hates you! -Spoilt child.
translation.fr: Parce que mère te déteste. Enfant gâtée.Je dirai que tu es sortie seule.

translation.en: I'll tell Mother you have left the farm alone.
translation.fr: Enfant gâtée.Je dirai que tu es sortie seule.

translation.en: Black Phillip saith I can do what I like.
translation.fr: Philippe le Noirdit que je peux.

translation.en: Devil take your Black Phillip.
It's your fault I can't leave the yard.
I could go to the brook before you let the Witch take Sam.
translation.fr: parce que tu as laissé la sorcièreprendre Sam.

translation.en: -Quiet thee. -It were a wolf stole Sam.
translation.fr: Tais-toi. - C'était un loup.- Une sorcière !

translation.en: A witch. I've seen her in her riding cloak about the wood.
translation.fr: - C'était un loup.- Une sorcière ! Je l'ai vue, avec sa cape,près du bois.

translation.en: -Father showed me the tracks. -It was a witch!
translation.fr: Père m'a montré les traces. C'était une sorcière !

translation.en: It was a witch, Mercy.
You speak aright.
-Thomasin! -It was I.
Liar.
'Twas I what stole him. I be the Witch of the Wood.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui l'ai pris.Je suis la sorcière de la forêt.

translation.en: Liar. Liar.
I am.
List not to her, Mercy!
I am that very witch.
When I sleep,
translation.fr: Quand je dors,mon esprit quitte mon corps

translation.en: my spirit slips away from me body and dances naked with the Devil.
translation.fr: Quand je dors,mon esprit quitte mon corps et danse nu avec le diable.

translation.en: -That's how I signed his book. -No...
He bade me bring him an un-baptized babe,
translation.fr: Il exigeait un bébé non baptisé,

translation.en: so I stole Sam, and I gave him to me master.
translation.fr: j'ai pris Sam et l'ai donné à mon maître

translation.en: And I'll make any man or thing else vanish I like.
translation.fr: et je ferai disparaître qui je veux.

translation.en: -No. -Aye. And I'll vanish thee, too, if thou displeaseth me.
translation.fr: Je te ferai disparaîtresi tu me déplais.

translation.en: -Be quiet. -Mercy, she's but telling fantasies!
Or perchance I'll boil and bake thee,
-since we are lack of food. -Stop!
Stop, Thomasin!
-It's not true! -It is, thou thing!
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai ! Oh que si !Je plongerai les dents dans ta chair !

translation.en: How I crave to sink my teeth into thy pink flesh.
translation.fr: Oh que si !Je plongerai les dents dans ta chair !

translation.en: If ever thou tellst thy mother of this, I'll witch thee and thy mother! -And Jonas, too! -Caleb!
translation.fr: Si tu en parles à ta mère,je vous jetterai un sort !

translation.en: -Stop thy tears and swear thy silence. -I swear it.
translation.fr: - Jure de ne rien dire.- Je le jure.

translation.en: You will not tell Mother nor Father.
translation.fr: - Ni à mère ni à père.- Je le jure.

translation.en: -I swear. -Thomasin, let her alone!
translation.fr: - Ni à mère ni à père.- Je le jure. Thomasin, laisse-la !

translation.en: Get away from her, Caleb, or she'll witch thee!
translation.fr: Sauve-toi, Caleb,elle va te jeter un sort.

translation.en: Why tell Mercy those horrible fancies?
Dost thou hate me now, too?
It was a wolf stole Sam.
translation.fr: C'est un loup qui a pris Sam.

translation.en: Leave me be. Go tell Mother and Father of my wickedness.
translation.fr: Laisse-moi. Va dire à mère et pèreque je suis mauvaise.

translation.en: I hate thy pity. I need it not.
translation.fr: Je déteste ta pitié.Je n'en ai nul besoin.

translation.en: ...and forgive us the sins we have this day committed against thee.
translation.fr: Pardonne-nous nos péchés de ce jour,

translation.en: Free us from the shame and torment which are due unto us for them.
translation.fr: délivre-nous de la honteet du tourment qui nous accablent.

translation.en: We beseech thee, increase our faith in the promise of the Gospel,
translation.fr: Nous T'imploronsde renforcer notre foi en l'Évangile,

translation.en: our fear of thy name,
and the hatred of all our sins,
translation.fr: et la haine de nos péchés,

translation.en: that we may be assured that the Holy Spirit dwells in us,
translation.fr: de nous assurerque le Saint-Esprit réside en nous,

translation.en: that we might be thy children in thy love and mercy.
translation.fr: que nous sommes Tes enfants,baignés de Ta miséricorde.

translation.en: For as we hunger for this food of our bodies,
so our souls hunger for the food of eternal life.
translation.fr: autant que nos âmesréclament la vie éternelle.

translation.en: Finish soon our days of sin,
translation.fr: Mets fin à nos vies de pécheurs

translation.en: and bring us to eternal peace
translation.fr: pour nous accueillirdans la paix éternelle,

translation.en: through the purifying blood of thy son,
translation.fr: par le sang purificateur de Ton fils,

translation.en: our Lord and only Savior Jesus Christ.
Thomasin, what hast thou done with the silver cup?
translation.fr: Thomasin,où as-tu mis ma coupe en argent ?

translation.en: Is't not on the shelf?
Nay.
In the six board then.
T'aint there neither.
It has been disappeared for some while.
translation.fr: Elle a disparu depuis un moment.

translation.en: Didst lose it?
I've not touched it.
Where has it gone then?
I haven't touched it.
I have caught thee trifling with it before.
translation.fr: Je t'ai déjà vue jouer avec.

translation.en: She sayth she haven't touched it, Katherine.
translation.fr: Elle dit qu'elle n'y a pas touché.

translation.en: How thou could lose me father's silver wine cup in this hovel, I cannot know.
translation.fr: Comment as-tu pu perdre la coupede mon père dans ce taudis ?

translation.en: -I haven't touched it. -Peace, child,
translation.fr: Je n'y ai pas touché. Silence. Elle a disparu.

translation.en: it is gone.
Did a wolf vanish that, too?
translation.fr: Un loup l'a prise, elle aussi ?

translation.en: She haven't touched it, Katherine.
What is amiss on this farm?
translation.fr: Que se passe-t-il, dans cette ferme ?

translation.en: It is not natural.
will thou read out the chapter of the Word tonight?
translation.fr: Veux-tu nous lirele chapitre du verbe, ce soir ?

translation.en: We must find some light in our darkness.
translation.fr: Nous devons trouver de la lumièredans ces ténèbres.

translation.en: Tomorrow we will have a fast day but for our sins.
translation.fr: Demain, nous jeûnerons pour expier nos péchés.

translation.en: Thomasin, didst not bed them down before supper?
translation.fr: Ne devais-tu pas les rentreravant le dîner ?

translation.en: You must sleep tonight, Kate.
translation.fr: Il faut dormir cette nuit, Kate.

translation.en: Thou dost remember I love thee?
I do.
List me, Kate,
I fear thou dost look too much upon this affliction.
translation.fr: Je trouve que ce malheurte bouleverse trop.

translation.en: We must turn our thoughts towards God,
translation.fr: Nous devons tourner nos penséesvers Dieu

translation.en: not ourselves.
He hath never taken a child from us.
translation.fr: Il ne nous a jamais pris d'enfant.

translation.en: Never a one, Kate.
Who might earn such grace?
We have been ungrateful of God's love.
-He hath cursed this family. -No.
He hath taken us into a very low condition to humble us
translation.fr: Il nous fait vivre très pauvrementpour nous rendre humbles

translation.en: and to show us more of his grace.
translation.fr: et pour nous révéler Sa grâce.

translation.en: Was not Christ led into the wilderness to be ill met by the Devil?
translation.fr: Le Christ n'a-t-il pas rencontréle diable dans le désert ?

translation.en: -We should ne'er have left the plantation. -Kate...
translation.fr: Nous n'aurions pas dûquitter la colonie.

translation.en: We should never have left.
That damned church!
-There is naught hither. -What need we? Silver chalices?
translation.fr: - Il n'y a rien ici.- Nous faut-il des calices d'argent ?

translation.en: How dare you chide me on a cup.
translation.fr: Tu oses me reprocher cette coupe ?

translation.en: 'Tis not for vanity that I am grieved of it.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas par vanitéque je la regrette.

translation.en: -Katherine, I must tell thee-- -We might have sold it.
translation.fr: - Je dois te dire...- Nous l'aurions vendue.

translation.en: What?
What fool will trade for our corn?
List me.
Our daughter hath begat the sign of her womanhood.
Are y'abed?
She's old enough. She must leave to serve another family.
translation.fr: Elle a l'âge de partir travaillerdans une autre famille.

translation.en: 'Twas not her fault.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas sa faute.Je dois te dire...

translation.en: -Kate, I must tell thee-- -Aye, it was thine for taking thy family hither.
translation.fr: C'est ta faute,car tu nous as amenés ici.

translation.en: -This is Godly land... -Godly?
translation.fr: Cette terre est bénie... Bénie ? Nos enfants grandissentcomme des sauvages !

translation.en: Our children are being fostered up like savages.
translation.fr: Bénie ? Nos enfants grandissentcomme des sauvages !

translation.en: How oft I begged and begged thee to take Samuel for baptism.
translation.fr: Je t'avais suppliéde faire baptiser Samuel !

translation.en: They'd not baptize outside the congregation.
translation.fr: Ils ne baptisentque ceux de la congrégation.

translation.en: -Our Sam is in hell! -Go to.
translation.fr: Notre fils est en enfer ! Arrête.

translation.en: God save us, Caleb is well.
We must keep him still. And Thomasin.
That corn is trash.
-We cannot back to that church! -We will starve!
translation.fr: Nous ne pouvonsretourner dans cette église ! Nous mourrons de faim !

translation.en: Peace, peace. You'll wake 'em. Peace.
translation.fr: Du calme ! Tu vas les réveiller.

translation.en: I'll to the village with the horse and Thomasin tomorrow.
translation.fr: J'irai à cheval au villageavec Thomasin demain.

translation.en: The Tildens or the Whytings, they can make use of her.
translation.fr: Les Tilden ou les Whyting pourraient l'employer.

translation.en: They are good folk.
We will find food. I know it.
translation.fr: Nous aurons de quoi nous nourrir,je le sais.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Go to sleep.
What's this?
Tell me, now.
-Running away then? -No.
-Lie not to me. -I don't.
Then what?
Tell me!
If thou wilt back to sleep, and keep silent of this,
translation.fr: Si tu vas te coucher sans me dénoncer,

translation.en: I promise thee,
you'll need not leave to serve the Tildens, nor any family else.
translation.fr: que tu n'auras pas à servir les Tildenni personne d'autre.

translation.en: I'll be back by midday.
translation.fr: Je serai de retour pour midi.

translation.en: -Let me along with you. -No.
-Let me along. -I cannot.
If you don't let me along with you, I'll wake Mother and Father this instant.
translation.fr: Si tu ne me laisses pas venir,je réveille père et mère.

translation.en: Well?
Aye, but we did!
-Nay. -We did.
We had glass windows in England. We haven't been hither so long you can forget that.
translation.fr: Nous avions des vitres aux fenêtresen Angleterre, as-tu oublié ?

translation.en: As you like, Thomasin.
You've gone mad.
Dost not remember Fowler laying on the floor i'the sun?
translation.fr: Rappelle-toi, Fowlerse couchait par terre au soleil.

translation.en: You must.
And where the sun would shine would he warm himself.
translation.fr: Il s'installait au soleil,où qu'il brille, pour se réchauffer.

translation.en: Remember once he lay upon the table,
and Father saw him and he saith, "We will have him for meat! "Kate, Kate! We will roast this beast."
translation.fr: Père l'a vu et il a dit :"Mangeons-le ! Kate, faisons-le rôtir !"

translation.en: You must remember that.
I remember that day, but no glass.
translation.fr: Je me rappelle ce jour-là, mais pas les vitres.

translation.en: Well, it was pretty.
What is it, boy?
Burt, calm thee!
Fowler, nay! Fowler!
Stand there with Burt!
I'll straight back!
He's gone mad.
O God my Lord, I now begin, O help me, and I'll leave my sin.
translation.fr: Seigneur Dieu, aie pitié, aide-moi à renoncer au péché.

translation.en: For I repentant now shall be. From evil, I will turn to thee.
translation.fr: Je ferai pénitence,me détournerai du mal en silence,

translation.en: None ever shall destroy my faith, nor do I mind what Satan saith.
translation.fr: nul n'ébranlera ma foi,le diable en sera coi.

translation.en: O God my Lord, I now begin, O help me, and I'll leave my sin.
translation.fr: Seigneur Dieu, aie pitié,aide-moi à renoncer au péché.

translation.en: For I repentant now shall be. From evil, I will turn to thee.
translation.fr: Je ferai pénitence,me détournerai du mal en silence,

translation.en: None ever shall destroy my faith, nor do I mind what Satan saith.
translation.fr: nul n'ébranlera ma foi,le diable en sera coi.

translation.en: O God my Lord, I now begin, O help me, and I'll leave my--
translation.fr: Seigneur Dieu, aie pitié, aide-moi à renoncer au péché...

translation.en: Father!
My girl! My girl!
Where is thy brother?
What's the matter with thee, Thomasin? What's the matter with thee?
I'll set off at first light. I'll not return till I've found him.
translation.fr: Je partirai à l'aubeet ne reviendrai qu'avec lui.

translation.en: 'Twould be better to go to the village to raise up help.
translation.fr: Mieux vaut demander de l'aideau village.

translation.en: -I cannot bear... -'Tis a day's ride,
translation.fr: C'est à une journée de chevalet je n'en ai plus.

translation.en: and I have no horse. There is no time to be lost.
translation.fr: C'est à une journée de chevalet je n'en ai plus. Il n'y a pas de temps à perdre.

translation.en: Likely you should have left this morn then.
You have no gun, William, nay, not even a dog.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas de fusil, pas même un chien,sois raisonnable !

translation.en: -Be not a fool! -I am a fool to go.
translation.fr: pas même un chien,sois raisonnable ! Je suis déraisonnable de t'écouter,personne ne nous aidera.

translation.en: There is none will help this family.
translation.fr: Je suis déraisonnable de t'écouter,personne ne nous aidera.

translation.en: Let me be!
The moon is bright. The rain bothers me not.
translation.fr: La lune brilleet la pluie ne me gêne pas.

translation.en: I'll be back in a two-day, if any a man will return with me.
translation.fr: Je vais au village,nous verrons si l'on m'aide.

translation.en: Don't go, Father!
-Please you, Father, don't go! -Enough!
Tell us why you went to the wood.
translation.fr: Dis-nousce que vous faisiez dans la forêt.

translation.en: -I promised. -I care not.
Let me find favor in your eyes.
translation.fr: Laissez-moi trouver grâce à vos yeux !

translation.en: Child, tell me, and thou wilt.
translation.fr: Pour cela,il faut me répondre maintenant !

translation.en: Speak!
I took thy father's cup.
translation.fr: J'ai pris la coupe de ton père.

translation.en: I sold it.
Forgive me, Kate.
Forgive me, Thomasin.
What is this?
Katherine, I must make confession.
I, yestermorn, took Caleb to the wood.
translation.fr: Hier matin,j'ai emmené Caleb en forêt.

translation.en: 'Twas for food, and the pelts for money. Good money.
translation.fr: Le gibier nous aurait nourris,nous aurions vendu les peaux.

translation.en: I knew you were false!
-I knew it! -I meant it as a surprise, 'twas why I kept secret. I will trap that wolf, Kate.
translation.fr: Je voulais que ce soit une surprise.J'aurai ce loup !

translation.en: You stood by whilst our son lied to me!
translation.fr: Tu as laissé notre fils mentir !

translation.en: 'Twas for thy sake. I love thee, Kate.
-You took him to the woods! -I will find him.
translation.fr: - Vous étiez dans la forêt !- Je le retrouverai.

translation.en: You have broken God's covenant. You are a liar.
translation.fr: Tu as péché, tu as mentiet tu as perdu un autre enfant !

translation.en: -And you have lost another child. -I will go now.
translation.fr: Tu as péché, tu as mentiet tu as perdu un autre enfant ! Je m'en vais.

translation.en: -You cannot escape the wood! -I will find him!
translation.fr: - On n'échappe pas à la forêt.- Je le retrouverai !

translation.en: And kill thyself, too? Will Jonas be the man of the house?
translation.fr: Tu vas mourir aussi ?Jonas sera l'homme de la maison ?

translation.en: Will you damn all your family to death?
-Katherine! -Let go of me!
Picking apples.
Mother,
have the goats been bedded down yet?
I'll do it.
Let it wait till the morrow.
They dare not 'scape with this rain.
translation.fr: elles ne vont pas se sauversous la pluie.

translation.en: Nay, I'll do it.
Please you, Mother.
Come hither, child.
Hurry back.
Father!
O merciful Father, the Lord and giver of life,
translation.fr: Notre Père, aie pitié, Seigneur et créateur de la vie,

translation.en: and your son Jesus Christ, we beseech thee,
translation.fr: au nom de Ton fils le Christ,nous T'implorons.

translation.en: look down from heaven upon him
translation.fr: Veille sur lui depuis le Ciel,

translation.en: with those eyes of grace and compassion.
translation.fr: accorde-lui Ta grâce et Ta compassion,

translation.en: Pity thy wounded servant.
translation.fr: aie pitié de Ton serviteur meurtri.

translation.en: What ails Caleb, Black Phillip?
What ails him? Did Thomasin make 'im sick in the wood?
translation.fr: Dis-moi ce qu'a Caleb.Qu'a-t-il ? Thomasin l'a rendu maladedans la forêt ?

translation.en: What say you?
Black Phillip saith you are wicked. Aye, he told me, too.
translation.fr: - Il dit que tu es mauvaise.- Il me l'a dit aussi.

translation.en: Damn your Black Phillip!
He saith you put the Devil in Caleb, that's why he's sick.
translation.fr: Il dit que tu as fait entrer le démonen Caleb.

translation.en: I'd never hurt Caleb, nor Sam, nor thee.
translation.fr: Je ne ferais de mal ni à Caleb,ni à Sam, ni à toi.

translation.en: -You beat me! -It was a jest.
translation.fr: - Tu m'as tapée.- J'ai fait semblant.

translation.en: -You said you'd eat of me! -Mercy!
-Mother and Father will find out. -What?
That you are a witch.
translation.fr: - Quoi ?- Que tu es une sorcière.

translation.en: Dost remember John Kempe's son?
translation.fr: Te souviens-tu du fils de John Kempe ?

translation.en: That first winter, he was tormented of Indian magic.
translation.fr: Il avait été ensorcelé par les Indiens.

translation.en: 'Tis not the same.
This is unnatural providence.
I know not that.
Look at thy son.
-Will. -What?
-Think. -Think what?
Think.
I have no thought.
Does this not look like witchcraft?
translation.fr: Ne dirait-on pas de la sorcellerie ?

translation.en: What witch?
Who does this then? Who?
Thy thoughts are as a child.
What are you doing?
We'll back to the plantation in the morn.
translation.fr: Nous retournerons à la colonie demain.

translation.en: Find a good family for Thomasin, take Caleb to the doctor's.
translation.fr: Nous trouverons une famillepour Thomasin et un médecin pour Caleb.

translation.en: He will tell if this be some natural ill or no.
translation.fr: Il saura si c'est une maladie naturelle.

translation.en: Yet we cannot return as beggars.
translation.fr: Mais nous n'y retournerons pasles mains vides.

translation.en: I will scour the field. There must be some fruit yet untouched by this rot.
translation.fr: Il faut ratisser le champ,tout n'a peut-être pas pourri.

translation.en: I beseech thee, Katherine, what canst thou do for him presently?
translation.fr: Je t'en supplie,que peux-tu faire pour lui ?

translation.en: How might we all bear it to the village with no horse?
Well, the little corn and the goats should fetch a fair price. We'll...
translation.fr: Entre le maïs et les chèvres,nous gagnerons assez...

translation.en: We'll back with Caleb and sell them, return with a horse for the twins and Thomasin.
translation.fr: Nous reviendrons avec un chevalpour les jumeaux et Thomasin.

translation.en: -You cannot leave them here! -Or Thomasin and thee...
translation.fr: Tu veux les laisser ici ? Thomasin et toi...

translation.en: -Forget the crop, Will! -What?
What dost thou want, Katherine?
Tell me and I will give it thee.
translation.fr: Dis-le et je te le donnerai.

translation.en: I want to be home.
Thou shall be home by candle-time tomorrow.
translation.fr: Nous serons rentrés demainavant la nuit.

translation.en: In England.
I also have a confession to make.
translation.fr: Je dois te confesser quelque chose.

translation.en: I never meant to be a shrew to thee.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas voulu devenir une mégère.

translation.en: I have become as Job's wife, I know it,
translation.fr: Je suis comme la femme de Job,je le sais.

translation.en: since Sam, since...
My heart has turned to stone.
translation.fr: Mon cœur s'est changé en pierre.

translation.en: I had dreamed once, 'twas when I was of Thomasin's years,
translation.fr: Un jour, j'ai fait un rêve, je devais avoir l'âge de Thomasin,

translation.en: that I was with Christ upon Earth.
translation.fr: que j'étais avec le Christ sur Terre.

translation.en: I was so very near him,
and in many tears for the assurance of the pardon of me sins,
translation.fr: et je pleurais pour obtenirle pardon de mes péchés.

translation.en: and I was so ravished with his love towards me,
translation.fr: J'étais transportée de joiepar son amour pour moi.

translation.en: I thought it far exceeding the affection of the kindest husband.
translation.fr: C'était bien au-delà de l'affectiondu plus doux des maris.

translation.en: And since Samuel disappeared,
translation.fr: Mais depuis que Samuel a disparu...

translation.en: I have such a sad weakness of faith. I cannot shake it.
translation.fr: ma foi est tristement faibleet je ne peux rien y faire.

translation.en: I cannot see Christ's help as near.
translation.fr: Le secours du Christne me semble plus si proche.

translation.en: I pray and I pray, but I cannot...
translation.fr: Je prie encore et encore,mais je ne peux...

translation.en: I fear I cannot ever feel that same measure of love again.
translation.fr: J'ai peur de ne plus pouvoir ressentirun tel amour.

translation.en: Thou shalt have of it in heaven.
I'll be i'the field.
If you can spare a while, do.
translation.fr: Si tu trouves un moment, viens.

translation.en: We'll leave at dawn.
I promise thee that.
Jonas, Mercy! Come hither!
Speak not a word.
Black Phillip is a merry, merry king He rules the land with mirth...
translation.fr: Philippe le Noir est un roi joyeuxau rire légendaire.

translation.en: I cannot abide your songs.
Please you, Mercy.
Black Phillip has a mighty, mighty sting He'll knock thee to the earth
translation.fr: Philippe le Noir est un roi vicieux,il te jettera à terre...

translation.en: Sing baa baa King Phillip the Black sings baa, baa...
translation.fr: Il chante : bê bê,Philippe le Noir chante bê, bê, bê.

translation.en: -Peace, thou thing. -Mercy. Thomasin.
Sing baa baa, King Phillip the Black He'll knock thee on thy back!
translation.fr: Il chante : bê bê,Philippe le Noir te jettera à terre.

translation.en: Enough!
Come.
Get the broad ax and cut off her head.
Get the narrow ax and cut off her head.
Get the broad ax and cut off her head.
Get the narrow ax and cut off her head.
She's upon me!
She kneels!
My bowels, my stomach,
she pinches, scratches.
-Sin! -Brother!
-Thomasin, take the children outside. -No!
Who does this to thee? Who does this?
His mouth is sealed up.
God!
-Caleb. -Hold him.
Children, away from this.
Thomasin, help!
He'll break his jaws.
translation.fr: Il va se briser la mâchoire.

translation.en: Mother!
What is't?
he is witched!
-'Tis she! -No!
-What horrible fancy's this? -She told me she stole Sam!
translation.fr: - Que dis-tu ?- Elle a pris Sam !

translation.en: -She gave him to the Devil in the wood. -They lie!
translation.fr: Elle l'a donné au diable ! Ils mentent.

translation.en: What say you? She turned Flora's milk to blood!
translation.fr: - Que racontes-tu ?- Elle a changé le lait en sang.

translation.en: She had bade us keep secret from you!
It was but a jest to quiet her. I...
-She made bargain with Satan! -She signed his book!
translation.fr: - Elle a pactisé avec Satan.- Elle a signé son livre.

translation.en: Silence!
Don't let her near me. She'll place a curse on me!
translation.fr: Elle va me jeter un sort !

translation.en: -They conspire against me. -Thomasin is a witch!
translation.fr: Ils se liguent contre moi. Thomasin est une sorcière !

translation.en: Nay. I'll not hear it.
I'll have proof, or heaven help thee.
translation.fr: Il me faut des preuves,ou que le Ciel vous aide.

translation.en: On thy knees!
Look me in the eye, daughter.
-Dost thou love the word of God? -Yes.
Love you the Bible? Love you prayer?
We are children of sin all,
translation.fr: Nous sommes tous nés du péché

translation.en: yet I tell thee, I have raised up no witch in this house!
translation.fr: mais je t'avertis, je n'ai pas élevéde sorcière chez moi.

translation.en: Let us pray,
then we need fear nothing.
translation.fr: Nous n'aurons plus rien à craindre,

translation.en: We shall never lie open to the wicked one.
translation.fr: nous ne serons plus la proie du malin.

translation.en: Pray for thy brother.
-You must believe us. -Evil wretches! -Thomasin! -Thomasin!
Pray.
Our Father, which art in heaven,
translation.fr: Notre Père, qui es aux Cieux,

translation.en: hallowed be thy name, thy kingdom come...
Jonas, pray.
I... I cannot remember my prayer.
translation.fr: J'arrive pas à me rappeler la prière.

translation.en: -What? -Nor I.
I cannot.
What nonsense is this?
Speak, children.
Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be thy name...
translation.fr: Notre Père, qui es aux Cieux, que Ton nom soit sanctifié...

translation.en: -Please, stop it. -Pray.
-Stop it! -Pray, you beasts.
-Get on thy knees and pray! -Damnation!
I cannot hear this. This is not so!
translation.fr: Je n'entends pas ce que je crois,ce ne peut être vrai !

translation.en: A toad.
A cat.
A crow.
A raven.
A great black dog.
A wolf.
She desires of my blood.
-Sends 'em upon me! -She desires of my blood.
-They feed upon her teats... -She desires of my blood.
translation.fr: Elle les nourrit à son sein,

translation.en: ...her nether parts!
She sends 'em upon me!
My Lord, my Jesus, save me!
-Think on Christ! -She sends her devils!
translation.fr: Remets-t'en au Christ ! Elle envoie ses démons !

translation.en: I am thine enemy,
wallowing in the blood and filth of my sins!
translation.fr: je me vautre dans le sanget la fange de mes péchés...

translation.en: -The Lord is my shepherd... -I am thine enemy!
translation.fr: Le seigneur est mon berger,je ne manque de rien.

translation.en: -...I shall not want. -He maketh me lie down
translation.fr: Sur des prés d'herbe fraîche,Il me fait reposer,

translation.en: -in green pasture... -And leadeth me by the still waters.
translation.fr: Il me mène vers les eaux tranquilles

translation.en: He restoreth my soul and leadeth me in the paths of righteousness
translation.fr: et me fait revivre. Il me conduit par le juste cheminpour l'honneur de Son nom.

translation.en: -for his name's sake. -I am thine enemy!
translation.fr: Il me conduit par le juste cheminpour l'honneur de Son nom.

translation.en: Yea, though I should walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
translation.fr: Si je traverse les ravins de la mort,

translation.en: I will fear no evil... For thou art with me!
translation.fr: je ne crains aucun malcar Tu es avec moi.

translation.en: Cast the light of countenance upon me.
translation.fr: Inonde-moi de la lumière de ton visage.

translation.en: Spread over me the lap of thy love.
Wash me in the ever-flowing fountains of thy blood.
translation.fr: Lave-moi à l'intarissable fontainede ton sang.

translation.en: Wholly thine I am, my sweet Lord Jesus.
translation.fr: Je suis tout à toi, mon doux Jésus.

translation.en: My Lord, my love, kiss me with the kisses of thy mouth.
translation.fr: Mon seigneur, mon amour, pose sur moi les baisers de tes lèvres.

translation.en: How lovely art thou.
Thy embrace.
My Lord!
My Lord, my love!
My soul's salvation.
Take me to thy lap!
Wake up. Wake up!
He is dead!
Jonas, Mercy, get up.
Get up!
Get away from him! Get thee gone!
translation.fr: Ne t'approche pas de lui ! Caleb n'est plus !

translation.en: This tree will be lovely come spring.
translation.fr: Cet arbre sera magnifique, au printemps.

translation.en: Do you remember when we came hither?
Such a pretty tree.
Next year I'd have sown us a wheat field.
translation.fr: J'avais prévu de planter du blé,l'an prochain,

translation.en: Started at this tree and ended thither.
We'd have been a proper farm then.
translation.fr: Nous aurions eu une vraie ferme.

translation.en: Bought us a big fat milk cow,
translation.fr: J'aurais acheté une grosse vache à lait,

translation.en: finished us the barn...
You must tell me, Thomasin.
translation.fr: Tu dois me le dire, Thomasin.

translation.en: Tomorrow, I cannot keep secret of this.
translation.fr: Demain,je ne pourrai garder cela secret.

translation.en: A council will be called, and thy life is...
translation.fr: Un conseil se réunira et ta vie sera...

translation.en: -Thy life... -Will you not believe me?
translation.fr: Un conseil se réunira et ta vie sera... Vous refusez de me croire ?

translation.en: I saw the serpent in my son. You stopped their prayers.
translation.fr: Le mal possédait mon fils,tu les as empêchés de prier !

translation.en: They lie.
I saw it.
Caleb disappeared with thee.
-I love Caleb. -And who then found him,
translation.fr: J'aime Caleb ! Et qui l'a retrouvé ?

translation.en: pale as death, naked as sin and witched?
translation.fr: Pâle comme la mort, nu comme le péché et ensorcelé.

translation.en: Thomasin, listen to me, the bargain thou hast made is of no effect.
-I made no bargain. -Thy soul belongeth to Christ.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas pactisé. - Ton âme appartient au Christ.- Je n'ai pas pactisé !

translation.en: -I made no bargain. -The Devil hath no interest in thee.
translation.fr: - Ton âme appartient au Christ.- Je n'ai pas pactisé ! Le diable n'a aucun droit sur toi.

translation.en: -I am no witch, Father. -What did I but see in my house?
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas une sorcière. Alors, qu'ai-je vu chez moi ?

translation.en: -Will you not hear me? -I prithee, confess.
Why have you turned against me?
Christ can unwitch us if you will but speak truth to me.
translation.fr: Le Christ peut nous libérersi tu me dis la vérité.

translation.en: As I love thee, speak truth.
translation.fr: Je t'aime, tu dois me dire la vérité.

translation.en: You ask me to speak truth?
I beg thee.
translation.fr: Je te supplie de me la dire.

translation.en: You and Mother are planned to rid the farm of me.
translation.fr: Vous et mère avez prévude vous débarrasser de moi.

translation.en: Aye. I heard you speak of it.
translation.fr: Je vous ai entendus en parler.

translation.en: Is that truth?
You took of Mother's cup and let her rail at me.
translation.fr: Vous avez laissé mère m'accuser,pour sa coupe.

translation.en: You confessed not till it was too late.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez parlé que trop tard,est-ce la vérité ?

translation.en: -Is that truth? -Peace, thee.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez parlé que trop tard,est-ce la vérité ? - Calme-toi.- Non.

translation.en: -I will not. -I am thy father.
translation.fr: - Calme-toi.- Non. - Je suis ton père.- Tu es hypocrite.

translation.en: You are a hypocrite!
translation.fr: - Je suis ton père.- Tu es hypocrite.

translation.en: Hold thy tongue, daughter mine!
You took Caleb to the wood, and let me take the blame of that, too.
translation.fr: Tu as emmené Caleb en forêtet on m'a blâmée.

translation.en: Is that truth?
You let Mother be as thy master.
translation.fr: Tu laisses mère être ton maître.

translation.en: You cannot bring the crops to yield! You cannot hunt!
translation.fr: Tu ne sais pas cultiver,tu ne sais pas chasser !

translation.en: -Is that truth enough? -Enough.
Thou canst do nothing save cut wood!
translation.fr: Tu ne sais que couper du bois !

translation.en: Bitch!
And you will not hear me!
Must I hear the Devil wag his tongue in thy mouth?
translation.fr: Le diable parle par ta bouche !

translation.en: Ask the twins then.
Go on, ask them.
They spend all day long babbling to that horned beast.
translation.fr: ils jacassent avec cette bête à cornes.

translation.en: -They know well his voice. -Go to.
The Adversary oft comes in the shape of a he-goat.
translation.fr: Le malin prend souventla forme d'un bouc

translation.en: And whispers. Aye, whispers!
He is Lucifer.
You know it.
translation.fr: Tu le sais, et les jumeaux le savent.

translation.en: -The twins know it. -Slander thy brethren no more.
translation.fr: Tu le sais, et les jumeaux le savent. Ne les calomnie pas !

translation.en: It is they!
From my sight.
'Twas they and that goat what bewitched this whole farm.
Lies.
Was't a wolf stole Sam?
translation.fr: C'est un loup qui a pris Sam ?

translation.en: I never saw no wolf.
Mercy told me herself by the stream, "I be the Witch of the Wood."
translation.fr: Mercy m'a dit près du ruisseau : "Je suis la sorcière de la forêt."

translation.en: Get up. Rise!
-What is this? -Speak.
I am no witch.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas une sorcière.

translation.en: Get her from me sight. I'll not have her in this house.
translation.fr: Sors-la, je n'en veux pas ici.

translation.en: She is no witch, Katherine.
What is the cause, daughter? Tell thy mother.
translation.fr: Que se passe-t-il ?Dis-le à ta mère.

translation.en: I cannot know for certain.
Thou toldst me well thou knew!
I cannot look at her.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas la regarder.

translation.en: Aye, but y'shall. Thomasin?
Jonas and Mercy, they made covenant with the Devil in the shape of Black Phillip.
translation.fr: Jonas et Mercy ont pactisé avec le diablesous la forme de Philippe le Noir.

translation.en: Dost hear that?
Ye black minions?
Dost hear that, yolk devils?
Wake!
Wake from this!
Did ye make some unholy bond with that goat?
translation.fr: Avez-vous conclu un pacte avec le bouc ?

translation.en: Speak if this be pretense!
Dissemblers.
Grave pretenders all.
Hear me this.
I will not play a fool to children's games.
translation.fr: je ne serai pas le jouet d'enfants.

translation.en: This is no sport, William.
Yet these lies from our babes' mouths are but trifles to them.
translation.fr: Les mensonges de nos petitsne sont rien pour eux.

translation.en: -I do not lie! -Silence, creature!
translation.fr: - Je ne mens pas !- Silence, créature !

translation.en: Thy son is dead. Damned!
-Caleb did but cry Jesus. -The Devil!
translation.fr: Caleb a crié le nom de Jésus. - C'était le diable !- Tu n'en sais rien.

translation.en: -Thou know it not! -The Devil will speak the Scripture, too.
translation.fr: - C'était le diable !- Tu n'en sais rien. Le diable peut citer les Écritures.

translation.en: Thou know it not! 'Tis not true!
translation.fr: Tu n'en sais rien, c'est faux !

translation.en: -We are damned! -Wake!
Fetch the billhook, wife,
and I will smite Jonas as Abraham would have done his seed.
translation.fr: Je frapperai Jonascomme Abraham l'aurait fait !

translation.en: -No. Stop it! Stop it! -Fetch the billhook,
translation.fr: Arrête ! Va chercher ma serpe,je lui enfoncerai le crâne !

translation.en: and I will dash his skull!
translation.fr: Va chercher ma serpe,je lui enfoncerai le crâne !

translation.en: -Do you see? -Stop it.
Do you see now?
Please you, Father?
No, it is not safe. Not with them!
Keep me from this goat.
If that old billy be the Devil, I would have danced with him myself.
translation.fr: Si ce bouc était le diable,j'aurais dansé avec lui.

translation.en: I'll break thee out upon the dawn, and we'll set back to the plantation.
translation.fr: Je vous libérerai à l'aube, et nous retournerons à la colonie.

translation.en: Think on thy sins.
Are you witches?
Does Father think I am?
Are you?
Doth he really speak to thee?
It is my fault.
I confess it.
O my God,
I am false.
I am infected with the filth of pride.
translation.fr: Je suis coupable du péché d'orgueil,

translation.en: I know it.
I am.
Dispose of me how thou wilt,
translation.fr: Fais de moi ce que Tu voudras,

translation.en: yet redeem my children.
They cannot tame their natural evils.
translation.fr: Ils ne peuvent maîtriserle mal qui est en eux.

translation.en: I lie before thee a coward
translation.fr: Je m'incline devant Toi, moi qui suis lâche,

translation.en: and thine enemy,
and I'll lick the dust of thine earth.
translation.fr: et je lèche la poussière sur Ta Terre.

translation.en: I beg thee,
save my children.
I beg thee, my Christ,
translation.fr: Je T'en supplie, au nom du Christ,

translation.en: I have not damned my family!
translation.fr: que je n'aie pas voué ma familleà la damnation !

translation.en: My lambs.
Me angels.
Mother, we have longed to see you so.
translation.fr: Mère, nous avions tellement enviede vous voir.

translation.en: As I to thee.
I must wake thy father.
He will be so glad.
No, let him sleep.
We would see you oft, Mother.
translation.fr: Nous pourrions nous voir souvent, mère.

translation.en: -Would that please you? -Aye.
I have brought a book for you, Mother.
translation.fr: Je vous ai apporté un livre.

translation.en: -Will you look at it with me? -Aye.
One moment now.
Samuel is hungry.
Come, come, little Sam.
Flora? Flora?
Corruption, thou art my father.
What hast thou done?
Where are they?
-I know not what I saw... -Where are they?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Où sont-ils ?

translation.en: I did nothing. She came from the sky, she...
Devil!
You have their blood upon thy hands!
translation.fr: Tu as leur sang sur les mains !

translation.en: It is you.
-It is you! -I am your daughter!
The Devil is in thee and hath had thee.
translation.fr: Le diable est en toi,il t'a possédée.

translation.en: You are smeared of his sin.
translation.fr: Il t'a souillée de son péché.

translation.en: You reek of evil!
-You have made a covenant with death! -Mother!
translation.fr: Tu as pactisé avec la mort !

translation.en: You bewitched thy brother, proud slut!
translation.fr: Tu as ensorcelé ton frère, traînée !

translation.en: Did you not think I saw thy sluttish looks to him,
translation.fr: Tu croyais que je n'avais pas vutes regards ?

translation.en: bewitching his eye as any whore?
-What say you to me? -And thy father next!
You took them from me.
-They are gone. -No.
-You killed my children! -No! No!
You killed thy father! You witch!
translation.fr: Tu as tué ton père ! Sorcière !

translation.en: I love you! I love you!
Black Phillip.
I conjure thee to speak to me.
Speak as thou dost speak to Jonas and Mercy.
translation.fr: Parle-moicomme tu parles à Jonas et Mercy.

translation.en: Dost thou understand my English tongue?
Answer me.
What dost thou want?
What canst thou give?
Wouldst thou like the taste of butter?
A pretty dress?
Wouldst thou like to live deliciously?
Wouldst thou like to see the world?
What will you from me?
Dost thou see a book before thee?
Remove thy shift.
I cannot write my name.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas écrire mon nom.

translation.en: I will guide thy hand.
